caption.p: MDS plot of rodent middens based on plant pathogen assemblages detected using 18S metabarcoding. Filled circles represent middens deposited during CAPE, empty circles represent middens deposited outside CAPE, and the square represents the oldest midden sampled (49,600â€‰yrs BP). Al, Albugo; Co, Colletotrichum; Do, Dothideomycetes; Fu, Fusarium culmorum; Hy, Hyaloperonospora; Ph, Phytophthora; Pu, Pucciniaceae; Py, Pythium; Us, Ustilaginomycotina.
